entry.title: Saturday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 8.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Fog patches dissipating this afternoon. Wind south 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 8. Wind chill minus 23 this morning and minus 15 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Saturday 07 January 2023
